title: MeetElise’s AI Technology Helping the Property Management Industry
author: Nate Shames
summary: This article discusses how MeetElise's AI technology is transforming the property management industry, highlighting their growth and partnerships.
main_content:
"Originally formed in 2017 by co-founders Minna Song and Tony Stoyanov to address the multitude of operational and logistical challenges of affordable housing, New York City-based technology company [MeetElise](https://www.meetelise.com/) has experienced unprecedented growth and recognition as the Property Management industry’s leader of AI technology. This growth and recognition came, in part, after successfully launching the company’s AI-driven leasing assistant platform and partnering with two of the nation’s largest owners of multifamily apartment units."

---
